**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 72 [Ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=218) creatures are typically hairless and gaunt with blue or purple skin and pointed ears.
  • Add the [ghoul](/Traits.aspx?ID=218) and [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) traits.
  • Add the following immunities: [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38).
  • Decrease all saving throw modifiers by 1.
  • Add the paralysis ability to the creature's jaws, fangs, or similar [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack. If the creature doesn't have one, add one with the same attack and damage as its strongest melee attack.
  • Add the following abilities.
    **[Darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)**
    **[Negative Healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)**
    **Paralysis** ([occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When the creature gets a critical hit with its jaws against a living, non-[elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) foe of the creature's level or lower, the foe is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) until the end of the foe's next turn.
    **Swift Leap** [one-action] ([move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The creature jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.
name: Ghoul Adjustments
